content.rendered:
Car Magnets

 

Posterhead makes custom car magnets in a variety of sizes. The most common size being the 12″ x 18″ (Posterhead sells a pair of 2 for $30.00). These long lasting vehicle magnets are made with 30mil magnet sheets and are produced in full color (meaning you can have as many colors as you want on it, including pictures and company logos). They are great for the small businessman who wants to advertise their business. These magnets can be placed on any vehicle in just a few moments to make the vehicle a business vehicle and then removed from the vehicle in seconds to turn the vehicle back into a family car.

Many people underestimate the advertising impact of these eye catching signs. When having these magnets on your vehicle, you are seen by hundreds of other people traveling down the roads of Las Vegas. Since the cost of a pair of 12″ x 18″ car magnets is $30.00, it equates to a very low cost approach of getting your business recognized.

Our magnets will not damage the vehicles paint and are long lasting. They can be made in a variety of sizes to match the needs of your vehicle. It is important to remember that magnets should not be placed over a molding or body line that allows for a gap between the magnet and the vehicle so that wind does not blow the vehicles magnet off the car. Also, the bigger the magnet, the more probability that bumps in the road and jostling of the vehicle may result in the magnet losing its adherence. Car magnets have better adherence to the vehicle if they are smaller. In this particular case, smaller is better.

Contact Posterhead Signs for your Magnets today !

 

 

If you need a size not listed, just ask!
Contact us for additional specials
